00039 void RequestHandlerRelease::run() {
00040   ResponseCallback cb(m_comm, m_event_ptr);
00041   size_t decode_remain = m_event_ptr->payload_len;
00042   const uint8_t *decode_ptr = m_event_ptr->payload;
00043 
00044   try {
00045     uint64_t handle = decode_i64(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00046 
00047     m_master->release(&cb, m_session_id, handle);
00048   }
00049   catch (Exception &e) {
00050     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00051     cb.error(e.code(), "Error handling RELEASE message");
00052   }
00053 }
